name: The Land of Crayon Drawings
description:
The Land of Crayon Drawings by Benjamin Debski

This is my short and incomplete yet playable entry for Paint Jam 2021. Its an adventure/puzzle game made using Phaser 3. This is my first game using the framework. Previously I had been using Game Maker Studio though I had played around in Godot before going with Phaser finding the small footprint attractive. I drew the graphics with the Windows 7 version of mspaint and the limited myself to the default palette. Paint.net was used to add transparency. In the past two jams I've done more precise pixel art and it was nice doing something more free hand.

Controls:

Mouse over items for a description and left click to interact with them.

Left click on an item in the inventory to equip it.

Credits:

Graphics & code by me.

Generic pickup sound by slamaxu

https://freesound.org/people/slamaxu/sounds/509879/
